title: Immigration medical exam results (I-693)
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, civil surgeon name/signature, vaccination records, exam date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Medical clearance status (passed/issues). Link to civil surgeon verification system (USCIS only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake medical exams. Domain binding verifies USCIS-authorized civil surgeon. Green card requirement. Sealed envelope integrity. Vaccination compliance. Prevents medical exam fraud. Uses SHA-512 (medical privacy).
